synopsis.text: To embark on an enchanting journey through 9th century ancient China, join Chen Shi, a compassionate young man on a mission to find his long-lost brother. His search leads him to the bustling capital city of Luoyang and, more specifically, to the esteemed Dali Court, a high-ranking government institution. In a curious twist of fate, Chen Shi finds himself working as an officer under the watchful eye of Li Bing, a senior official with the striking appearance of a white cat. As they work together to solve crimes and navigate the intricacies of daily life under the rule of Empress Wu Zetian, the first and only female monarch of ancient China, Chen Shi's adventure promises to be both captivating and heartwarming.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
